lead_paragraph: The sergeant, who was responding to a call of a woman acting irrationally, fired twice after she picked up a baseball bat and tried to strike him, the police said.

headline.print_headline: Self-Defense Cited as Sergeant Fatally Shoots Woman in Bronx
headline.main: Police Cite Self-Defense as Sergeant Fatally Shoots Bronx Woman, 66

snippet: The sergeant, who was responding to a call of a woman acting irrationally, fired twice after she picked up a baseball bat and tried to strike him, the police said....
abstract: New York City police sergeant shoots and kills woman in Bronx after she tried to hit him with baseball bat.
